channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Quay.io trigger Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins Project -- Jenkins Quay.io trigger Plugin

item.title: CVE-2023-30520|2023-10-24T12:49:41.311Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20quay.io%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Quay.io trigger Plugin 0.1 and earlier does not limit URL schemes for repository homepage URLs submitted via Quay.io trigger webhooks, resulting in a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exploitable by attackers able to submit crafted Quay.io trigger webhook payloads.

item.title: CVE-2023-30519|2023-10-24T12:49:40.147Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20quay.io%20trigger%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Quay.io trigger Plugin 0.1 and earlier allows unauthenticated attackers to trigger builds of jobs corresponding to the attacker-specified repository.
